name: 2024 the 9th International Conference on Cloud Computing and Big Data Analytics
content: Publication: Submitted paper will be peer reviewed by conference committees, and accepted papers will be included in ICCCBDA 2024 Conference Proceedings, which will be archived in IEEE Xplore , and indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, and other indexing services. ICCCBDA 2024 is listed in IEEE conference calendar: https://conferences.ieee.org/conferences\_events/conferences/conferencedetails/61447 Journal Recommendation: Human-Centric Intelligent Systems Selected paper will be recommended and invited to publish an extended version on the following journals. Please make sure you have added at least 30% of a new contents.
